sourceOrganization.name: EDCTP Program
sourceOrganization.abstract: European and Developing Countries Clinical Trials Partnership (EDCTP) funds research to prevent and treat HIV/AIDS, tuberculosis, malaria, and neglected infectious diseases in sub-Saharan Africa. The program supports collaborative clinical trials to improve health outcomes in endemic regions.
sourceOrganization.description: European and Developing Countries Clinical Trials Partnership (EDCTP)  funds research for prevention and treatment of HIV/AIDS, tuberculosis, malaria, and neglected infectious diseases in sub-Saharan Africa. For more information, visit the NIAID program page: https://www.niaid.nih.gov/research/clinical-trials-partnerships
alternateName: European and Developing Countries Clinical Trials Partnership
